name: Catch it! (Bédu Louis)
description:
CATCH IT! is an arcade local-multiplayer game, in top view.

Two players play on one computer, on the same keyboard and each control a boat equipped with a cannon but without ammunition. A bomb is thrown randomly in the field of a player who can pick it up and fire at his opponent. If the opposing player is hit by the bomb or that he doesn't pick up the bomb before a time runs out, the bomb explode and the player who threw the bomb scores a point. A bomb is then thrown back to the field of the player being hit. And so on...

_______________________________________________________________

VICTORY CONDITIONS:

  • Have a greater score than the opponent before the time runs out (60s)

HOW TO SCORE A POINT:

  • Fire and hit the opponent boat with the cannonball
  • If the opponent manages to dodge, the bomb explode in his filed after 5s

_______________________________________________________________

CONTROLS (only keyboard and numpad):

Player 1:

  • Z to accelerate
  • Q & D to turn left and right
  • Spacebar to shoot

Player 2:

  • UpArrow to accelerate
  • LeftArrow & RightArrow to turn left and right
  • Spacebar to shoot

_______________________________________________________________

Made by Bédu Louis, student in Game Design at ICAN, Paris, in only 3 days, when doing my first year of studies!
